data.message: How do I set news feed to most recent on Android mobile. You guys keep moving it and this time it seems like you have removed it. If I cannot sort by most recent I will just delete Facebook. I have already cut back due to your asinine security changes all the time. Most times I just use Facebook to quickly register with websites or programs but they have multiple choices now yahoo, Google and some others that I can use instead.

replies.message: Hey Jim. Top Stories is designed to show you similar stories to ones that you engage with the most before ones that you typically don't. If you want to see stories in the order that they are posted, you can adjust your News Feed to Most Recent. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/1t8ROZ0. -Chantal
Facebook, it doesn't STAY on most recent, it keeps changing back to top stories.  Do you even listen to people's concerns out just post canned "answers"?
Chad, they care about useless and trivial things, not legitimate concerns.

Wow .people .well black people are being shot and killed just because the cops know they can get away with it .every time they shoot ,no one fired at them first .,now a 12 year old boy.i remember in the 70`s some one shot and killed a young black boy for walking across a reble flag painted on a rock.i know how i felt back then .i went and found a gun was"nt able to drive but.i got on my bike left home.went to organhill road around all day with my .45cal  they never found who killed that kid.i did not know him but part of me died with him.
